sen.j: 殖栗皇子（えくり の みこ、敏達天皇6年（578年） - 没年不詳）は用明天皇の第五皇子。
sen.e: Prince Ekuri (578 - year of death unknown) was the fifth son of Emperor Yomei.
Prince Ekuri (578 - year of death unknown) was the fifth son of Emperor Yomei.
Prince Ekuri (578 - year of death unknown) was the fifth son of Emperor Yomei.
His mother was ANAHOBE no Hashihitohime.
His mother was ANAHOBE no Hashihitohime.
His mother was ANAHOBE no Hashihitohime.
His career wasn't recorded at all.
His career wasn't recorded at all.
His career wasn't recorded at all.

sen.j: ただし唐本御影に兄の聖徳太子、甥の山背大兄王と写っている。
sen.e: But he was with his elder brother Prince Shotoku and his nephew Prince Yamashiro no oe in Tohon Miei (Portrait of Prince Shotoku).
